data.title: Libxdf-dev
data.description: C++ library for loading XDF files
data.name: libxdf

evidence: README mentions releases: "* Find Source and Prebuilt Binaries on the [releases page](https://github.com/Yida-Lin/libxdf/releases)."

"Libxdf is a cross-platform C++ library for loading multimodal, multi-rate signals stored in XDF files. Libxdf is used in the biosignal viewing application SigViewer and the LSL application XDFStreamer. It can also be integrated into other C++ applications."
"Libxdf is a built-in component of SigViewer... If you wish to build SigViewer from source, follow these steps: 1. Download `xdf.h` and `libxdf.a` from the release page."
